server - package server
 
ServerConnection - Class in server
This class maintains/encapsulates the connection to the client, handles the input/output streams (because it subclasses SocketConnection), decodes/parses messages FROM THE CLIENT according to the protocol, and encodes/generates messages TO THE CLIENT according to the protocol.
ServerConnection(Socket) - Constructor for class server.ServerConnection
Constructor for ServerConnection.
ServerConnection.State - Enum Class in server
This class defines States.
ServerError - Exception in exception
This is the exception class for handling errors for the server.
ServerError(String) - Constructor for exception exception.ServerError
This method will return the error code with the appropriate error message with a protocol.
